item.title: algorithm training from codility
item.description: TRAINING counting elements When every value of the element in a numeric array is in range. We can get a counter array of which the index of every element is the value and the value is the counter. Prefix Sums Prefix sums array defines as: So prefix sums array is very useful to compute the sum of any array slice (contiguous segments of array). For example: sum(a2…a5) = p6- p2
